itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by U.S. Army Captain Katie Hernandez to talk about her breaking the female world record for running a mile in an Explosive Ordnance Disposal bomb suit, her nickname “Female Hurt Locker”, how she got into Explosi...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by U.S. Army Captain Katie Hernandez to talk about her breaking the female world record for running a mile in an Explosive Ordnance Disposal bomb suit, her nickname “Female Hurt Locker”, how she got into Explosive Ordnance Disposal in the first place, and competing in CrossFit competitions — plus Dan breaks down the latest police shooting in Minnesota, and Ross and Dan give their thoughts on the upcoming Coinbase IPO.

 

Go to CardoMAX.com and use promo code DB, and you get Buy One Get One FREE on your first order.

Go to HelloFresh.com/drinkinbros12 and use code DRINKINBROS12 for 12 free meals, including free shipping!
